title: Tibetan traders
creator_credit: J. Michael Hagopian and Atlantis Productions
brief_description: Shows the way of life, beliefs and the epic journey of semi-nomadic traders dwelling in one of the strategic mountain passes between south-western Tibet and India in the Himalayas.
